text: Hexura rothi is a species of spider in the family Mecicobothriidae. It was described by Gertsch & Platnick, 1979 — USA. It has two spinnerets. It is found in the southern Central Oregon Coast Ranges through the Klamath Mountains into Del Norte, California.Field Guide to the Spiders of California and the Pacific Coast States by Richard J. Adams page 48 ==References== Category:Mygalomorphae Category:Spiders of the United States Category:Spiders described in 1979
title: Hexura rothi
